title: Best Male Soccer Player ESPY Award
text:
The Best Male Soccer Player <a href="ESPY%20Award">ESPY Award</a> was presented annually to the <a href="male">male</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">soccer</a> (<a href="association%20football">association football</a>) player adjudged to be the best in a given <a href="calendar%20year">calendar year</a> amongst those contesting the sport on the <a href="professional%20sports">professional</a> or <a href="FIFA">international</a> level. The award, along with the <a href="Best%20Female%20Soccer%20Player%20ESPY%20Award">Best Female Soccer Player ESPY Award</a>, evolved from the <a href="Best%20Soccer%20Player%20ESPY%20Award">Best Soccer Player ESPY Award</a>, which was awarded in <a href="2000%20in%20sports">2000</a> and <a href="2001%20in%20sports">2001</a>, and the latter once more absorbed the gender-specific awards in <a href="2005%20in%20sports">2005</a>.
During the award's three years, the voting panel comprised variously <a href="fan%20%28aficionado%29">fans</a>, who participated through <a href="Internet">Internet</a> balloting; <a href="sports%20journalism">sportswriter</a>s and <a href="Sports%20presenter">broadcasters</a>, sports <a href="corporate%20officer">executives</a>, and retired <a href="sportsperson">sportsperson</a>s, termed collectively "experts"; and <a href="List%20of%20ESPN%20personalities">ESPN personalities</a>. The <a href="ESPY%20Awards%23Ceremonies">ESPY Awards ceremony</a> was conducted in June and awards conferred reflected performance and achievement over the twelve months previous to presentation.
